overview: A new Nollywood movie, ‘Inside Life’, premiered at the Silverbird Galleria, Victoria Island, Lagos, last week.  It was produced by Chuks Enete and directed by Tope Adebayo Salami. The movie is the debut release of a new Nigerian film production house, Sillo studios.  Inspired by actual events, the movie revolves around the faltering Nigerian Judicial system and its effect on a man’s life.  In attendance at the premiere were actors and comic stars; Wole Ojo and Nedu Wazobia, and others. Also, the victim of the unfair Judicial system Lanre Olorunnisola, whose story inspired the film, was present at the event.
title: Inside Life
